title: MOD崩溃，谁能帮我看看是哪出问题了？
author: Eirik
txt_content:
---- Minecraft Crash Report ----

WARNING: coremods are present:
  MMFMLCorePlugin (MultiMine-1.8.jar)
  BetterFoliageLoader (BetterFoliage-mc1.8-1.1.3汉化.jar)
  InputFix (InputFix-1.8.x-v2.jar)
  BetterFps ([1.8]Ex-BetterFps-1.1.0(2).jar)

  MovingWorldCoreMod (movingworld-1.8-ALPHA-3.3.jar)
  FMLPlugin (InventoryTweaks-1.59-beta-173.jar)
  ItemPatchingLoader (ItemPhysic Full 1.1.2 mc1.8.jar)
Contact their authors BEFORE contacting forge

// I just don't know what went wrong :(

Time: 15-9-26 下午1:33
Description: Stitching texture atlas
